item.title: 美国航空公司达成 100 台氢-电发动机的临时协议
item.description: 美国航空公司周二表示，该公司已与发动机制造商 ZeroAvia 公司签订了购买 100 台氢-电发动机的临时协议。【原文：American Airlines said on Tuesday it had entered into a provisional agreement to buy 100 hydrogen-electric engines from engine maker ZeroAvia.】

item.title: 瑞银高管：人工智能正在改变银行业
item.description: 瑞士联合银行（UBS）国内业务主管萨宾-凯勒-布瑟（Sabine Keller-Busse）周二表示，在人工智能的推动下，客户与银行家的互动方式正在发生转变。【原文：UBS is seeing a shift in the way clients are interacting with their bankers powered by artificial intelligence, the head of the Swiss bank's domestic business Sabine Keller-Busse said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大航空公司将从出租方中银航空获得 8 架波音 737 MAX 喷气式飞机
item.description: 加拿大航空公司周二表示，该公司已同意从出租方中银航空（BOC Aviation）接收 8 架波音 737 MAX 8 喷气式飞机。【原文：Air Canada said on Tuesday that it has agreed to receive eight Boeing 737 MAX 8 jets from lessor BOC Aviation.】

item.title: 文件显示，拜登在 2024 年撤销了中国华为的 8 个许可证
item.description: 路透社看到的一份文件显示，拜登政府今年已吊销了允许一些公司向中国电信设备巨头华为发货的八张许可证，试图向这家卷土重来的公司施压。【原文：The Biden administration has revoked eight licenses this year that had allowed some companies to ship goods to Chinese telecoms equipment giant Huawei, according to a document seen by Reuters, as it seeks to pressure the resurgent company.】

item.title: 评级机构标普向美国、法国和其他主要经济体发出债务警告
item.description: 信用评级公司S&P Global周二警告说，美国、法国和主要经济体不太可能在未来几年内停止债务水平的上升。【原文：The United States, France and major economies are unlikely to halt the rises in their debt levels in the next few years, credit rating firm S&P Global warned on Tuesday.】

item.title: Polestar 出现亏损，计划采取措施抵消对中国产电动汽车征收的关税
item.description: 电动汽车（EV）制造商Polestar周二公布第一季度经营亏损，表示将不得不采取措施抵消欧盟和美国对其中国产电动汽车征收的高额进口关税。【原文：Electric vehicle (EV) maker Polestar said it will have to take steps to offset hefty EU and U.S. import tariffs on its Chinese-made electric cars as it posted a first-quarter operating loss on Tuesday.】

item.title: 关键就业数据公布前，超级大盘股回调，期指下跌
item.description: 华尔街股指期货周二下跌，原因是大盘股在盘中表现强劲后出现回调，而在本周将公布的就业数据和其他一系列重要的美国劳动力市场报告提供货币政策线索之前，一些谨慎情绪悄然升温。【原文：Wall Street's index futures dipped on Tuesday as megacap stocks pulled back after a strong session, while some caution crept in ahead of jobs opening data and a series of other crucial U.S. labor market reports due throughout the week for monetary policy cues.】

item.title: 无畏基金：多元化基金和黑人创始人倍感寒意
item.description: 据创始人、投资者和律师向路透社透露，就在美国一家上诉法院阻止一家由黑人拥有的风险投资公司为有色人种领导的企业提供资金的几周后，这一裁决已对以多元化为重点的风险投资基金这一小型行业产生了寒蝉效应。【原文：Just weeks after a U.S. appeals court blocked a Black-owned venture capitalist from funding women-of-color-led businesses, the ruling has had a chilling effect across the small industry of diversity-focused venture capital funds, according to founders, investors and lawyers who spoke to Reuters.】

item.title: 早间新闻增长减弱，曲线陡峭，鲍威尔在葡萄牙
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国第二季度新车销量增长可能放缓
item.description: 受 CDK 公司网络事件的影响，第二季度美国汽车销量的增长可能大幅放缓，尽管稳定的需求和更好的供应保持了新车销量的增长。【原文：Growth in U.S. auto sales likely slowed significantly in the second quarter, marred by a cyber incident at CDK, even though steady demand and better availability kept the sales for new vehicles elevated.】

item.title: 波音-精神：波音公司寻找新首席执行官，精神航空首席执行官成为焦点
item.description: 波音公司宣布将回购其陷入困境的供应商 Spirit AeroSystems 公司，投资者期待已久的这一消息现已将焦点转移到该公司寻找新首席执行官的工作上。【原文：Boeing's long-awaited announcement that it will buy back its struggling supplier, Spirit AeroSystems , now shifts the focus of investors to the planemaker's search for a new CEO.】

item.title: Jollibee Foods 将以 3.4 亿美元收购韩国 Compose Coffee 的控制权
item.description: 菲律宾最大的快餐连锁店 Jollibee Foods 周二表示，该公司将收购韩国 Compose Coffee 公司的多数股权，作为交易的一部分，目标公司的估值为 3.4 亿美元。【原文：The Philippines' biggest fast-food chain Jollibee Foods will acquire a majority stake in South Korea's Compose Coffee, as part of a deal valuing the target at $340 million, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉 6 月中国产电动汽车销量同比下降 24.2
item.description: 中国乘用车联席会（CPCA）周二公布的数据显示，特斯拉 6 月份在中国生产的电动汽车销量为 71,007 辆，同比下降 24.2%。【原文：Tesla's June sales of China-made electric vehicles fell 24.2% from a year earlier to 71,007, data from the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空公司年度利润大增 39%，达到创纪录的 16.7 亿美元
item.description: 卡塔尔航空公司（Qatar Airways）周二公布的年度净利润猛增 39%，达到创纪录的 61 亿卡塔尔里亚尔（约合 16.7 亿美元）。【原文：Qatar Airways posted a 39% jump in annual net profit to a record 6.1 billion Qatari riyals ($1.67 billion) on Tuesday.】

item.title: 瑞安航空 6 月客运量增长 11%，创历史新高
item.description: 瑞安航空公司（Ryanair）周二表示，6月份该公司的客运量达到创纪录的1930万人次，同比增长11%。【原文：Ryanair flew a record 19.3 million passengers in June, up 11% from a year earlier, the low-cost airline said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 政府称印度索姆酒厂童工每天工作 11 小时
item.description: 印度邦政府对索姆集团（Som Group）的一家酒厂进行检查时发现，一些年龄在 13 至 17 岁之间的童工被强迫灌装和包装酒瓶，而且工作时间很长。【原文：An Indian state government's inspection of a Som Group distillery said child labourers, some aged between 13 and 17, were made to fill and pack liquor bottles and worked long hours.】

item.title: 聚焦：德国工业在削减能源成本的竞赛中转向太阳能
item.description: 几个月来，菲利普-马蒂亚斯一直试图说服父亲在他们位于德国东部图林根州的公司屋顶上安装太阳能电池板，以降低这家金属制品厂的电费和碳排放。【原文：For months, Philip Matthias tried to convince his father to install solar panels on their company's roof in the eastern German state of Thuringia, aiming to cut electricity costs and carbon emissions at the metal products factory.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，日本主要保险公司将出售 31 亿美元的本田股份
item.description: 日本四家最大的财产保险公司和其他金融公司计划出售约 5000 亿日元（31 亿美元）的本田汽车股份，三位知情人士称，这是因为交叉持股做法的解禁正在加速。【原文：Four of Japan's top property and casualty insurers and other financial firms plan to sell around 500 billion yen ($3.1 billion) of shares in Honda Motor , three people said, as the unwinding of cross-shareholding practices accelerates.】

item.title: 法国餐饮集团索迪斯第三季度销售额不及预期
item.description: 法国餐饮企业索迪斯周二公布的第三季度销售额略低于预期，原因是该公司改变了与世界其他地区的一份大型合同相关的项目工程的核算方式。【原文：French food caterer Sodexo reported slightly lower than expected third-quarter sales on Tuesday, citing a change in how it accounts for project works related to a large contract in its Rest of the World segment.】

item.title: Wunsch 说，欧洲央行下一次降息是在选择变得困难之前的一个简单决定
item.description: 欧洲央行决策者皮埃尔-温施在接受采访时表示，欧洲央行下一次降息仍是一个相对容易的决定，但只有在通胀率明确迈向2%的目标时，才应采取后续举措。【原文：The European Central Bank's next interest rate cut is still a relatively easy decision, but subsequent moves should only come once inflation is clearly heading towards the 2% target, ECB policymaker Pierre Wunsch said in an interview.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪电动汽车季度销量大增 21%，缩小与特斯拉的差距
item.description: 中国比亚迪第二季度电动汽车销量增长了 21%，缩小了与特斯拉的差距，而特斯拉在第一季度将全球第一大电动汽车供应商的头衔拱手让给了中国比亚迪。【原文：China's BYD posted a 21% rise in second-quarter electric vehicle sales, closing the gap with Tesla after handing back the world's top EV vendor title to the U.S. rival in the first quarter.】

item.title: 意大利企业通过自学弥补技能差距
item.description: 29 岁的费德里科-奥利维耶里（Federico Olivieri）多年来一直从事非正式的农场工人工作，当一个巨大的建筑工地出现在他位于西西里岛的家旁边时，他简直不敢相信，这个建筑工地提供了大量所需的专业工作培训。【原文：After years of informal work as a farm labourer, Federico Olivieri, 29, could not believe it when a huge building site appeared next to his home in Sicily with training on offer for the numerous specialised jobs required.】

item.title: 网络泡沫的回声萦绕着人工智能驱动的美国股市
item.description: 人们对人工智能的热情推动美股大涨，这与二十年前的网络泡沫形成了鲜明对比，让人怀疑股价是否再次被对革命性技术的乐观情绪推高。【原文：A U.S. stock rally supercharged by excitement over artificial intelligence is drawing comparisons with the dotcom bubble two decades ago, raising the question of whether prices have again been inflated by optimism over a revolutionary technology.】

item.title: 解读：中国计划出台的金融稳定法是什么？
item.description: 作为中国政府在全球第二大经济体防范系统性金融风险的广泛努力的一部分，中国即将公布金融稳定法，其中包括设立一个基金来拯救陷入困境的金融机构。【原文：China is moving closer to unveiling its financial stability law, which includes setting up a fund to rescue troubled financial institutions, as part of Beijing's broader efforts to prevent systemic financial risks in the world's second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 早间竞标极右翼竞争对手的抉择日
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 大型开发商销售额降幅缩小，中国房地产企业跳涨
item.description: 周二，在香港上市的中国房地产公司股价大涨，此前有私人数据显示，6 月份中国主要房地产开发商的年销售额降幅继续收窄。【原文：Shares in Hong Kong-listed Chinese property companies surged on Tuesday, after private data showed yearly sales declines for major Chinese property developers continued to narrow in June.】

item.title: 金融时报》称，西门子能源计划为电网部门招聘 1 万名员工
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，西门子能源公司计划为其电网业务招聘 1 万多名新员工，到 2030 年，该业务将成为该能源工程集团最大的收入来源。【原文：Siemens Energy plans to recruit more than 10,000 new employees for its electricity grid business, set to be the energy engineering group's largest revenue driver by 2030, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行因向死亡客户收费而受到制裁
item.description: 澳大利亚银行业合规委员会周二表示，澳新银行集团因未能停止或退还已故客户的费用，以及未在规定时间内回复已故客户的代表而受到制裁。【原文：ANZ Group has been sanctioned for failing to stop or refund fees for dead customers and for not responding to representatives of customers who have passed away within a required time frame, Australia's Banking Code Compliance Committee said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 力拓谈判避免蒙古铜矿罢工
item.description: 全球矿业公司力拓正在与蒙古奥尤陶勒盖铜矿的工人进行谈判，以避免因工资大幅下降引发进一步的劳工行动。【原文：Global miner Rio Tinto is negotiating with workers at its Oyu Tolgoi copper operations in Mongolia to avert further industrial action over a sharp drop in wages that triggered an earlier strike in May.】

item.title: 特朗普风险提振美国收益率，美元飙升逼近 38 年来的日元峰值
item.description: 周二，在国债收益率飙升之后，美元兑日元汇率徘徊在近 38 年的高点附近，因为投资者在考虑唐纳德-特朗普可能第二次担任总统。【原文：The U.S. dollar hovered near an almost 38-year high to the yen on Tuesday following a surge in Treasury yields as investors contemplated the potential for a second Donald Trump presidency.】
